00033 // angular momentum of clusters restricted by JMAX
00034 // maximum number of SlaterDets per cluster CLMAX
00035 
00036 #define CLMAX 5
00037 
00038 
00039 typedef struct {
00040   SlaterDet* Qa;                
00041   int na;                       
00042   int Na;                       
00043   int *Ja;
00044   int *Ma;
00045   int *Pia;
00046   int npia;                     
00047   int izcwa;
00048   complex double (*wa)[CLMAX*(JMAX+1)];
00049   SlaterDet* Qb;                
00050   int nb;                       
00051   int Nb;
00052   int *Jb;
00053   int *Mb;
00054   int *Pib;
00055   int npib;
00056   int izcwb;
00057   complex double (*wb)[CLMAX*(JMAX+1)];
00058 
00059   double d;                     
00060 } DiClusterMultiProjSlaterDetInternals;
00061 
00062 
00063 MultiSlaterDet DiClusterMultiProjSlaterDet = {
00064   A : 0,
00065   N : 0,
00066   n : 0,
00067   symmetry : DiClusterMultiProjSlaterDetSymmetry,
00068   weight : DiClusterMultiProjSlaterDetWeight,
00069   get : DiClusterMultiProjSlaterDetGet,
00070   internals : NULL
00071 };
00072 
00073 
00074 // axial symmetry given by Ma+Mb 
00075 Symmetry DiClusterMultiProjSlaterDetSymmetry(const MultiSlaterDet* MSD, int iM)
00076 {
00077   DiClusterMultiProjSlaterDetInternals* internals = MSD->internals;
00078   int iMa = iM % internals->Na;
00079   int iMb = iM / internals->Na;
00080 
00081   Symmetry S=0;
00082   setSymmetry(&S, axial0 + internals->Ma[iMa] + internals->Mb[iMb]);
00083 
00084   return S;
00085 }

00087 
00088 complex double DiClusterMultiProjSlaterDetWeight(const MultiSlaterDet* MSD, int iM, int i)
00089 {
00090   DiClusterMultiProjSlaterDetInternals* internals = MSD->internals;
00091   int iMa = iM % internals->Na;
00092   int iMb = iM / internals->Na;
00093 
00094   int npia = internals->npia;
00095   int izcwa = internals->izcwa;
00096   int nanglespa = nangles3(izcwa)*npia;
00097 
00098   int npib = internals->npib;
00099   int izcwb = internals->izcwb;
00100   int nanglespb = nangles3(izcwb)*npib;
00101 
00102   int Ja, Ma, Pia;
00103   Ja = internals->Ja[iMa];
00104   Ma = internals->Ma[iMa];
00105   Pia = internals->Pia[iMa]; 
00106   
00107   int Jb, Mb, Pib;
00108   Jb = internals->Jb[iMb];
00109   Mb = internals->Mb[iMb];
00110   Pib = internals->Pib[iMb]; 
00111 
00112   int ia = i % (nanglespa*internals->na);
00113   int ib = i / (nanglespa*internals->na);
00114 
00115   int iangpa = ia % nanglespa;
00116   int iangpb = ib % nanglespb;
00117 
00118   double alphaa,betaa,gammaa;
00119   getangles3(izcwa, iangpa/npia, &alphaa, &betaa, &gammaa);
00120   //  fprintf(stderr, "i: %d, iangpa: %d, alphaa: %5.2f, betaa: %5.2f, gammaa: %5.2f\n",
00121   //  i, iangpa, alphaa, betaa, gammaa);
00122 
00123   double alphab,betab,gammab;
00124   getangles3(izcwb, iangpb/npib, &alphab, &betab, &gammab);
00125   // fprintf(stderr, "i: %d, iangpb: %d, alphab: %5.2f, betab: %5.2f, gammab: %5.2f\n",
00126   //  i, iangpb, alphab, betab, gammab);
00127 
00128   complex double ca = 0.0;
00129   int Ka;
00130   for (Ka=-Ja; Ka<=Ja; Ka=Ka+2)
00131     ca += (npia==2 && Pia==-1 && ia%2 ? -1.0 : 1.0)/nanglespa* (Ja+1)* Djmkstar(Ja,Ma,Ka,alphaa,betaa,gammaa)*internals->wa[iMa][idxjm(Ja,Ka)+ia/nanglespa*(Ja+1)];
00132 
00133   complex double cb = 0.0;
00134   int Kb;
00135   for (Kb=-Jb; Kb<=Jb; Kb=Kb+2)
00136     cb += (npib==2 && Pib==-1 && ib%2 ? -1.0 : 1.0)/nanglespb* (Jb+1)* Djmkstar(Jb,Mb,Kb,alphab,betab,gammab)*internals->wb[iMb][idxjm(Jb,Kb)+ib/nanglespb*(Jb+1)];
00137 
00138   // fprintf(stderr, "Ja: %d, Ma: %d, ca: (%8.3f, %8.3f), Jb: %d, Mb: %d, cb: (%8.3f, %8.3f)\n",
00139   //  Ja, Ma, creal(ca), cimag(ca), Jb, Mb, creal(cb), cimag(cb));
00140 
00141   return ca*cb;
00142 
00143 }

00145 // workspace
00146 static SlaterDet *tmpQa, *tmpQb;
00147 
00148 static void joinintoSlaterDets(const SlaterDet* Qa, const SlaterDet* Qb, SlaterDet* Q)
00149 {
00150   assert(Q->A == Qa->A+Qb->A);
00151 
00152   Q->Z = Qa->Z+Qb->Z;
00153   Q->N = Qa->N+Qb->N;
00154   Q->ngauss = Qa->ngauss+Qb->ngauss;
00155 
00156   int i;
00157   // copy Qa
00158   for (i=0; i<Qa->A; i++) {
00159     Q->idx[i] = Qa->idx[i];
00160     Q->ng[i] = Qa->ng[i];
00161   }
00162   for (i=0; i<Qa->ngauss; i++)
00163     Q->G[i] = Qa->G[i];
00164 
00165   // copy Qb
00166   for (i=0; i<Qb->A; i++) {
00167     Q->idx[i+Qa->A] = Qb->idx[i]+Qa->ngauss;
00168     Q->ng[i+Qa->A] = Qb->ng[i];
00169   }
00170   for (i=0; i<Qb->ngauss; i++) 
00171     Q->G[i+Qa->ngauss] = Qb->G[i];
00172 }

00174 
00175 void DiClusterMultiProjSlaterDetGet(const MultiSlaterDet* MSD, int i, SlaterDet* Q)
00176 {
00177   // initialize workspace
00178   if (!tmpQa) {
00179     tmpQa = malloc(sizeof(SlaterDet));
00180     tmpQb = malloc(sizeof(SlaterDet));
00181     allocateSlaterDet(tmpQa, MSD->A);
00182     allocateSlaterDet(tmpQb, MSD->A);
00183   }
00184 
00185   DiClusterMultiProjSlaterDetInternals* internals = MSD->internals;
00186 
00187   int npia=internals->npia;
00188   int npib=internals->npib;
00189 
00190   int nanglespa = nangles3(internals->izcwa)*npia;
00191   int nanglespb = nangles3(internals->izcwb)*npib;
00192 
00193   int ia = i % (nanglespa*internals->na);
00194   int ib = i / (nanglespa*internals->na);
00195 
00196   // fprintf(stderr, "get: i=%d, na=%d, nb=%d, nanglespa=%d, nanglespb=%d, ia=%d, ib=%d\n",     i, internals->na, internals->nb, nanglespa, nanglespb, ia, ib);
00197   
00198 
00199   double alphaa,betaa,gammaa;
00200   getangles3(internals->izcwa, (ia % nanglespa)/npia, &alphaa, &betaa, &gammaa);
00201 
00202   double alphab,betab,gammab;
00203   getangles3(internals->izcwb, (ib % nanglespb)/npib, &alphab, &betab, &gammab);
00204 
00205   // fprintf(stderr, "tmpQa->A : %d\n", tmpQa->A);
00206   // fprintf(stderr, "Qa[%d].A : %d\n", ia/nanglespa, internals->Qa[ia/nanglespa].A);
00207   // fprintf(stderr, "tmpQb->A: %d\n", tmpQb->A);
00208   // fprintf(stderr, "Qb[%d].A : %d\n", ib/nanglespb, internals->Qb[ib/nanglespb].A);
00209   copySlaterDet(&internals->Qa[ia/nanglespa], tmpQa);
00210   copySlaterDet(&internals->Qb[ib/nanglespb], tmpQb);
00211 
00212   double massa = tmpQa->Z*mproton + tmpQa->N*mneutron;
00213   double massb = tmpQb->Z*mproton + tmpQb->N*mneutron;
00214   double mass = massa + massb;
00215 
00216   double xa[3] = {0,0,0};
00217   double xb[3] = {0,0,0};
00218 
00219   xa[2] = massb/mass* internals->d;
00220   xb[2] = -massa/mass* internals->d;
00221 
00222   rotateSlaterDet(tmpQa, alphaa, betaa, gammaa);
00223   if (npia==2 && ia%2)
00224     invertSlaterDet(tmpQa);
00225   moveSlaterDet(tmpQa, xa);
00226 
00227   rotateSlaterDet(tmpQb, alphab, betab, gammab);
00228   if (npib==2 && ib%2)
00229     invertSlaterDet(tmpQb);
00230   moveSlaterDet(tmpQb, xb);
00231 
00232   joinintoSlaterDets(tmpQa, tmpQb, Q);
00233 
00234 }

00237 static void sreadcvec(char* s, int n, complex double* a)
00238 {
00239   char *c;
00240   double ref, imf;
00241   int l;
00242 
00243   c = strtok(s, " ,()");
00244   for (l=0; l<n; l++) {
00245     ref=atof(c); c=strtok(NULL, " ,()");
00246     imf=atof(c); c=strtok(NULL, " ,()");
00247     a[l] = ref + I*imf;
00248   }
00249 }

00252 #define BUFSIZE 4096
00253 int DiClusterMultiProjSlaterDetRead(FILE* fp, MultiSlaterDet* MSD)
00254 {
00255   *MSD = DiClusterMultiProjSlaterDet;
00256 
00257   DiClusterMultiProjSlaterDetInternals* internals = 
00258     malloc(sizeof(DiClusterMultiProjSlaterDetInternals));
00259 
00260   SlaterDet Qa, Qb;
00261   char fnamea[255], fnameb[255];
00262   char md5hasha[255], md5hashb[255];
00263 
00264   double d;
00265   int na, nb;
00266   int izcwa, izcwb;
00267   int npia, npib;
00268   int Na, Nb;
00269 
00270   char buf[BUFSIZE];
00271   fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00272   sscanf(buf, "<DiClusterMultiProjSlaterDet d=%lf na=%d izcwa=%d npia=%d Na=%d nb=%d izcwb=%d npib=%d Nb=%d>", 
00273          &d, &na, &izcwa, &npia, &Na, &nb, &izcwb, &npib, &Nb);
00274 
00275   internals->d = d;
00276   internals->na = na;
00277   internals->npia = npia;
00278   internals->izcwa = izcwa;
00279   internals->Na = Na;
00280   internals->nb = nb;
00281   internals->npib = npib;
00282   internals->izcwb = izcwb;
00283   internals->Nb = Nb;
00284 
00285   // Slater dets for Cluster a
00286 
00287   internals->Qa = malloc(na*sizeof(SlaterDet));
00288 
00289   int ia;
00290   for (ia=0; ia<na; ia++) {
00291     fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00292     sscanf(buf, "<Cluster %s %s>", fnamea, md5hasha); 
00293     if (strncmp(md5hasha, md5hash(fnamea), 32)) {
00294       fprintf(stderr, "...  SlaterDetFile does not match with existing hash\n");
00295       return -1;
00296     }
00297     if (readSlaterDetfromFile(&Qa, fnamea)) {
00298       fprintf(stderr, "... couldn't open %s for reading\n", fnamea);
00299       return -1;
00300     }
00301     cloneSlaterDet(&Qa, &internals->Qa[ia]);
00302   }
00303 
00304   internals->Ja = malloc(Na*sizeof(int));
00305   internals->Ma = malloc(Na*sizeof(int));
00306   internals->Pia = malloc(Na*sizeof(int));
00307   internals->wa = malloc(Na*CLMAX*(JMAX+1)*sizeof(complex double));
00308 
00309   int Ja;
00310   int Ma;
00311   int Pia;
00312   char ca[BUFSIZE];
00313 
00314   int Ia;
00315   for (Ia=0; Ia<Na; Ia++) {
00316     fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00317     sscanf(buf, "<Projection %d %d %d %[() ,.0-9eE+-]>", &Ja, &Ma, &Pia, ca);
00318 
00319     // fprintf(stderr, "Ja: %d, Ma: %d, Pia: %d, coefficients: %s\n",
00320     //      Ja, Ma, Pia, ca);
00321 
00322     internals->Ja[Ia] = Ja;
00323     internals->Ma[Ia] = Ma;
00324     internals->Pia[Ia] = Pia;
00325     sreadcvec(ca, na*(Ja+1), internals->wa[Ia]);
00326   }
00327 
00328 
00329   // Slater dets for Cluster b
00330 
00331   internals->Qb = malloc(nb*sizeof(SlaterDet));
00332 
00333   int ib;
00334   for (ib=0; ib<nb; ib++) {
00335     fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00336     sscanf(buf, "<Cluster %s %s>", fnameb, md5hashb); 
00337     if (strncmp(md5hashb, md5hash(fnameb), 32)) {
00338       fprintf(stderr, "...  SlaterDetFile does not match with existing hash\n");
00339       return -1;
00340     }
00341     if (readSlaterDetfromFile(&Qb, fnameb)) {
00342       fprintf(stderr, "... couldn't open %s for reading\n", fnameb);
00343       return -1;
00344     }
00345     cloneSlaterDet(&Qb, &internals->Qb[ib]);
00346   }
00347 
00348   internals->Jb = malloc(Nb*sizeof(int));
00349   internals->Mb = malloc(Nb*sizeof(int));
00350   internals->Pib = malloc(Nb*sizeof(int));
00351   internals->wb = malloc(Nb*CLMAX*(JMAX+1)*sizeof(complex double));
00352 
00353   int Jb;
00354   int Mb;
00355   int Pib;
00356   char cb[BUFSIZE];
00357 
00358   int Ib;
00359   for (Ib=0; Ib<Nb; Ib++) {
00360     fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00361     sscanf(buf, "<Projection %d %d %d %[() ,.0-9eE+-]>", &Jb, &Mb, &Pib, cb);
00362 
00363     internals->Jb[Ib] = Jb;
00364     internals->Mb[Ib] = Mb;
00365     internals->Pib[Ib] = Pib;
00366     sreadcvec(cb, nb*(Jb+1), internals->wb[Ib]);
00367   }
00368 
00369   MSD->A = internals->Qa[0].A + internals->Qb[0].A;
00370   MSD->N = Na*Nb;
00371   MSD->n = na*npia*nangles3(izcwa)*nb*npib*nangles3(izcwb);
00372   MSD->internals = internals;
00373 
00374   fprintf(stderr, "N: %d, n: %d\n", MSD->N, MSD->n);
00375 
00376   return 0;
00377 }
